Videographer Prices. A cost for a basic filming of the ceremony and church proceedings is $300 to $700. That is a ground floor package that will get you on film so you can relive the moment later in time. The next packages involve taping the ceremony and reception. This will cost $1,000 to $2,000. At these prices, a videographer will use some type of professional editing software to make your final product into a nice short movie or rolling photo scrapbook. An exclusive, highly in-demand videographer may charge $5,000 to $10,000. This is celebrity wedding type quality.
